results.title: An Illustration of basic film editing principles
results.brief_description: Leon Barsha of the American Cinema Editors has taken a sequence from the motion picture “Baby Face Nelson” to illustrate film editing techniques. Actors Mickey Rooney, Sir Cedric Hardwicke and Carolyn Jones are shown from our angle as on a stage. Then Leon Barsha shows how the same scene was heightened in mood and drama by editing with use of inserts - two shots, close-ups and extreme close-ups.
results.title_for_label: An Illustration of basic film editing principles

results.title: I'll tell you where to put your airport
results.creator_credit: John Groom, BBC-TV and Open University
results.brief_description: Program contrasts the modelling technique used in planning the new Mexico City Airpors with that used by the Roskill Commission for the siting of the third London Airport. Part 5 of Technology, a third level course. Systems modelling series.

results.title: I'll go again
results.creator_credit: Paul Cowan, Michael McKennirey, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: I’ll Go Again is a film about four athletes and a team that competed in the 1976 Montreal Olympics. They had trained courageously to be among those who would mount the podium to receive a medal. None did. Was it worth it? The film answers the question. (Awards: Budapest; Yorkton)
results.creator_credit_for_label: Paul Cowan, Michael McKennirey, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
results.description: I’ll Go Again is a film about four athletes and a team that competed in the 1976 Montreal Olympics. results.title: I'll find a way
results.creator_credit: Beverly Shaffer, Kathleen Shannon, Yuki Yoshida and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Children of Canada”.
When nine-year-old Nadia is allowed to attend a regular school, she knows the kids will tease her but she’ll “find a way to deal with it.” Nadia has spina bifida, a congenital condition that has caused a lack of sensation from the knees down. She uses crutches in order to walk. Nadia, in her own candid way, makes it clear that she is not looking for sympathy. She can do many things that children do, only she has a different way of doing them. (Ten Awards including Oscar, Hollywood; Salerno; Dubuque)
results.creator_credit_for_label: Beverly Shaffer, Kathleen Shannon, Yuki Yoshida and National Film Board of Canada

results.title: Ikebana: Japanese art of flower arrangement
results.brief_description: Ikebana is the Japanese art of flower arrangement which is now known throughout the Western world. The history, principles and theory of this type of flower arrangement are told.

results.title: Igor Stravinsky
results.creator_credit: Robert Graff, Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and National Broadcasting Company
results.brief_description: Stravinsky talks of his life and work with his young American associate, the conductor Robert Craft. They discuss the half century of creative effort in which Stravinsky has been a daring explorer of new forms in music.

results.title: If these were your children. Part 1
results.brief_description: Focuses on the behaviour of young children to help interpret early clues to possible emotional problems. Depicts the activities and behaviour of a group of second-grade children with their teacher during an ordinary school day. Includes conversations between the teacher and parents which illustrate the influence of the home.
